Radistor: He has attacked and betrayed the Maximals for the last time, the =
dragon must die!

The Airbomber side of him was getting the better of him. =
Suddenly, Train Wreck broke away and the other Radicons all fell to the gro=
und.

Airbomber: I had that dragon!

Stranato: You idiot! Hot Rod is trying=
 to fix things for us and you're trying to screw us up! Forgive us, Airbomb=
er is an idiot.

Airbomber: I'm your leader.

Stranato: Since when? I thoug=
ht I was leader!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
 =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 15, 2001 11:46 AM
  Subje=
ct: Confusion in battle


  ::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm::
=

  They all scatter as the shots come down on Radistor.

  "Stop your assua=
lt! He is Maximal. There was just a big confusion. Let
  him leave, and we'=
ll help you with repairs. There is need for further
  combat," said Cleder.=


  Hot Rod looked up.
  "Guys, I see two former Alliance bots. Meaning the=
 NDE. It's Shockwave,
  and my old friend Unitron. Watch them, they might a=
ttack."

om/info/terms/
